explains: adj. 不健全的；患病的；病态的
v. 使生病；传染（disease 的过去分词）
wordGroup: cardiovascular disease 心血管疾病；冠心病
coronary artery disease 冠状动脉疾病
alzheimer's disease 早老性痴呆；阿耳滋海默氏病
congenital heart disease 先天性心脏病
parkinson's disease [医]帕金森氏病；震颤性麻痹
renal disease 肾脏疾病；肾功能障碍

sentences.en: His diseased bladder left him incontinent.
sentences.cn: 他患病的膀胱使得他小便失禁。

sentences.en: In his diseased ravings he called himself the Prince of Wales, and bravely doth he keep up the character.
sentences.cn: 在他那病态的胡言乱语中，他称自己为威尔士王子，并勇敢地保持着这个称号。

sentences.en: The arteries are diseased and a transplant is the only hope.
sentences.cn: 动脉发生了病变，移植是惟一的希望。
